actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, S. Rept. 93-524.
Placed on calendar in Senate under "Subjects on the Table".

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for additional positions in grades GS-16, GS-17, and GS-18.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Increases the number of positions in grades GS-16, GS-17 and GS-18 from 2,754 to 2,994. Amends 5 U.S.C. 5108(a)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for additional positions in grades GS-16, GS-17, and GS-18.
